entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
